short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Classic 3D Bowling is a sport game - Throw the ball and hit as many pins as you can!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCTION
Play Classic 3D Bowling on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Classic 3D Bowling extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Classic 3D Bowling icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Classic 3D Bowling popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

HOW TO PLAY?
Tap to Throw the ball and hit as many pins as you can!

CONTACT
Please feel free to contact us at: https://www.w3technic.com/contact

PRIVACY POLICY
